definition: erhua variant of 夜宵[ye4 xiao1]

sentences.english: LuoXiaoChun to gu buildings to the hospital to send food taken late at night, two people came to the yard for a walk.
sentences.chinese: 駱曉春到醫院給顧阡陌送夜宵，兩人來到院子散步。

sentences.english: Eat up high-caloric food and can't give up coke-cola.
sentences.chinese: 喫高熱量的夜宵離不開可口可樂。

sentences.english: After supper, which was very rowdy, people began to gamble.
sentences.chinese: 夜宵時熱鬧非凡，夜宵以後開始賭錢。

sentences.english: After supper, which was very rowdy, people began to gamble.
sentences.chinese: 夜宵時熱鬧非凡，夜宵以後開始賭錢。

sentences.english: He could move his business from place to place and sell more "night lunches."
sentences.chinese: 他可以到處做生意，並且能賣出更多的夜宵。

sentences.english: After the show you must come with me and we'll have a little supper.
sentences.chinese: 演出結束以後，你們一定要和我一起喫點夜宵。

sentences.english: After a night snack with dady, it's already 10 a clock.
sentences.chinese: 晚上回來已經10點多了，跟爸爸一起出去吃了夜宵。

sentences.english: Don't eat supper, eat supper very easy incur gaunt.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫夜宵，喫夜宵很輕易招致瘦削。

sentences.english: Don't eat supper, eat supper very easy incur gaunt.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫夜宵，喫夜宵很輕易招致瘦削。

sentences.english: Just go for supper with my sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 現在喫夜宵時間好像都有點晚啊。

sentences.english: I had ete a midnight snack with my friends last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚，我跟幾個朋友去喫夜宵了。

sentences.english: L can't afford to go out to eot every night .
sentences.chinese: 我沒錢每天晚上出去喫夜宵。

definition: to soak cooked rice in soup or water/cooked rice reheated in boiling water
hot spicy soup (often sold in street stalls)
